introduction.value: Test suite for EXAMPLE. The purpose of this suite is to perform unit tests on the EXAMPLE modules.

details.value: A sequence is a collection of test cases executed in sequence sharing static code and data.

A test case is a small program testing a specific feature of the system under test. Test cases should not depend on things done in previous test cases because those could have failed leaving an unexpected state.

setup_code.value: /* Put here code that prepares for the test case execution, this code is executed before the test case.*/

local_variables.value: /* Declare here automatic variables used in the test case, it is good practice to not initialize values here.*/

details.value: This is a test case step. A step is an elementary piece of code part of a test case.
